/index.title: Space Station 23
/index.description: The official site for Space Station 23
/index.about: Sure... it's true. I was born when Rock n Roll was born; But even better, we Boomers in particular, have seen the evolution of the greatest variety of popular music, and here in SpaceStation23 it is my mission to celebrate and share it all!

Boo Daley.title: Creative Director and Voice extraordinaire
Boo Daley.description: Boo is not only the creator of SpaceStation23, he is also the voice behind many of the characters including Boo and Kale.

Ed Finlan.title: The voice of Mayor Eddie on the show
Ed Finlan.description: Ed and Boo have been friends since they were 5 years of age.

John Farley.title: The voice of Randy Lentstupide on the show
John Farley.description: John discovered his appreciation for music when he played in the Kindergarden Rhythm Band. Today his best instrument is the radio.

Troy Forster.title: Consulting Technology Director and CTO for Hire

Eric Tremblay.title: Station Manager, Amherst Island Radio
Eric Tremblay.description: CJAI-FM, known on air as Amherst Island Radio, is kind enough to provide weekly airtime for the transmission of SpaceStation23 into the ether. Please consider donating.

items.title: In the beginning....
items.description: Introduction of primary characters and the story of how SpaceStation23 comes to be!
items.featuredArtists: Rare Earth, Dierks Bentley,J.J. Cale, Genesis

items.title: The Mayor of Eddyburgh
items.description: Tribute to Little Richard and introduction of the owner of the Space Station complex, Mayor Eddy
items.featuredArtists: Jonathan Edwards, Playing for Change, Leon Russell, The Beatles, Little Richard

items.title: What's New (to you)
items.description: A healthy variety of music, including Mayor Eddy's request and the incomparable voice of Linda Ronstadt
items.featuredArtists: Bruce Springsteen, Hank Williams Jr. w/ Waylon Jennings, Joe Jackson, Linda Ronstadt, Hothouse Flowers

items.title: Victor Newman??
items.description: Summer tunes, and an unexpected call from a Soap character!
items.featuredArtists: Cream, Ridley Bent, Monte Python, Emmylou Harris, Sly and the Family Stone, Lovin' Spoonful

items.title: Canadiana!
items.description: Happy Canada Day! A celebration of a great diversity of Canadian artists.
items.featuredArtists: Edmonton Symphony Orchestra, Tragically Hip, Joni Mitchell, Rush, Sarah Harmer, Rankin Family, Neil Young, Gordon Lightfoot

items.title: Truly Classical
items.description: A gentle introduction to Classical music, from popular movie themes to the legends!
items.featuredArtists: John Williams, Ennio Morricone, Mozart, Debussy, John Horner, Rossini

items.title: Hothouse Mix!
items.description: Sweating it out in the Space Station, and jammin' under the stars!
items.featuredArtists: Thomas Dolby, Beach Boys, Arcade Fire, Free, Doobie Brothers,

items.title: Random picks
items.description: A whale of a story from Bill Gaffigan and more great tunes plucked from the ether!
items.featuredArtists: Bill Gaffigan, Prince, Buckingham-Nicks, Led Zeppelin, Procol Harum

items.title: Harmony!
items.description: Voices better in numbers...
items.featuredArtists: Elton John, The Beatles, Doc Walker, Little River Band, Temptations, O'Jays, Voces8, Eagles

items.title: Guests in SS23
items.description: More music sharing, including an in station performance and a gathering of the Advisory Council
items.featuredArtists: Bruce Cockburn, Heart, Commodors, Alison Kraus & Union Station, John Brine

items.title: Symphonic Rock!
items.description: Orchestras and rock, a match made in heaven!
items.featuredArtists: ELO, The Beatles, Queen, Elton John, Judy Tzuke, Blue Jays

items.title: Miss Alaneuss
items.description: I my capacity as your Captain in the Space Station, I offer another episode of fine random tunes!
items.featuredArtists: Tedeschi Trucks Band, Carly Simon, Van Morrison, Ricky Skaggs, Steve Earle Supertramp

items.title: Autumn comin'
items.description: Introducing the Omniscient "Noodle" from Space Station 9, Crickets and leaves of Autumn, and Carl Sagan's Pale Blue Dot
items.featuredArtists: Rodney Dangerfield, Annie Lennox, Leon Russell, Jesse Cook, Justin Hayward, Carl Sagan, Cassandra Vasic

items.title: Another SS23 Mix
items.description: In this episode... boats, monsters, sons, souls and a classic from The Band
items.featuredArtists: The Pogues, Cat Stevens, David Bowie, Aimee Mann, Eric Carmen, Collective Soul, Playing for Change

items.title: Countrified!
items.description: A great mix of classic country and new artists, including some 2020 CCMA nominees.
items.featuredArtists: Washboard Union, Big n Rich, Dierks Bentley and Friends, TRIO, Merle Haggard, Red Sovine, Eric Church, Tenille Townes

items.title: E G B D F
items.description: The Moody Blues classic 1971 album, Every Good Boy Deserves Favour in it's entirety!
items.featuredArtists: Moody Blues

items.title: John Lennon Tribute
items.description: On the very day that John Lennon would have celebrated his 80th birthday, SS23 offers a dozen of his best songs.
items.featuredArtists: John Lennon

items.title: The Eddysburgh Address
items.description: As is our custom, a good variety of new and classic tunes, PLUS, the Mayor of Eddyburgh speaks!
items.featuredArtists: The Wallflowers, Billie Eilish, Fleetwood Mac, John Bonomassa, Anne Wilson

items.title: Devil's Night!
items.description: A spook story, Springsteens Ghosts and more...
items.featuredArtists: Bruce Springsteen, Kathleen Edwards, Daniel Lanois, Van Morrison w/ Ray Charles, Led Zeppelin

items.title: SS23 Stew
items.description: A veritable Tune Soup, featuring some new inductees in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, and a gathering of the Advisory Council
items.featuredArtists: Hothouse Flowers, Doobie Brothers, Marc Bolan and T - Rex, Arkels, Roxy Music

items.title: Some JAZZ...
items.description: Here's a soft intro to the world of Jazz music in it's myriad forms. Have a listen more than once...it can grow on ya...
items.featuredArtists: Dizzy Gillespie, Chris Botti, Oscar Peterson, Cassandra Wilson, Irskin Hawkins, Joni Mitchell, The Richard Carpenter Trio

items.title: Humor me...
items.description: Some classic comedy bits, AND the Mayor shares some jokes...sort of.
items.featuredArtists: Bill Murray, Foster Brooks, Jerry Seinfeld, Laura Elliot, Monte Python, Mayor Eddy, George Carlin, SCTV, Jeff Foxworthy

items.title: Potpourri...
items.description: In this, another episode of music sharing, we feature a couple of current Canadian artists and some classics including a 50 year gem from George Harrison
items.featuredArtists: Dream Academy, Playing for Change, Joe Walsh, J.J. Wilde, The Glorious Sons, George Harrison

items.title: Christmas, part 1
items.description: From the Boo Daley mix tape of yuletide favourites...enjoy!
items.featuredArtists: The Beatles, Rita MacNeil, Emmylou Harris, Greg Lake, Sabrina Claudio, Ray Charles, Libera, John Denver, Faith Hill, John Mellencamp, The Carpenters, Kenny and Dolly, Chris Botti

items.title: Christmas, part 2
items.description: From the Boo Daley mix tape of yuletide favourites...enjoy!
items.featuredArtists: The Stanley Bros, Tchaikovsky, Barbara Streisand, Shaggy, Alison Kraus and Alan Jackson, Pavoroti, Eagles, Eurythmics, The Canadian Brass, Bing and Bowie, Rascal Flatts, Bruce Springsteen, Nat King Cole, The Gatlin Bros.

items.title: Covid and Country
items.description: Episode 26 is a tribute to the many country artists we lost in 2020, 3 to the Corona virus, plus a sentimental favourite for the New Year
items.featuredArtists: The Charlie Daniels Band, Hal Ketchum, John Prine, Joe Diffie, Charley Pride, Kenny Rogers, Dan Fogelberg

items.title: Hindsight is 2020!
items.description: Select songs from some of the #1 Albums of 2020
items.featuredArtists: Machine Gun Kelly, Shawn Mendes, Kenny Chesney, Taylor Swift, The Weeknd, Ariana Grande, Paul McCartney

items.title: Colours-Red White and Blue
items.description: Some great songs that fell through the cracks and a theme of reconciliation
items.featuredArtists: Bruce Cockurn, Bill Maher, Black Pumas, Billy Joel, Arc Angels, The Hollies, New Parachute Collective

items.title: Eddyburgh Stew
items.description: Introducing Randy Lentstupide; A special Black History Month salute with Stevie Wonder
items.featuredArtists: Patty Smyth, Justin Townes Earle, Rupert Hine, Stevie Wonder

items.title: Hitsville- A tribute to Motown
items.description: With the passing of Supreme's legend, Mary Wilson, I had to reflect on the magnificent Black History that was MOTOWN
items.featuredArtists: Smokey Robinson and the Miracles, Martha and the Vandellas, The Supremes, Marvin Gaye, Four Tops, The Temptations, Gladys Knight and the Pips

items.title: SS23 Re-launch!
items.description: The Advisory Council join in the announcement of the SpaceStation23 website with a replay of Episode 1
items.featuredArtists: J.J. Cale, Rare Earth, Dierks Bentley, Genesis, John Mayer
